title: COVID-19 Vaccine & Booster
cleaned_text: COVID-19 VACCINES ARE AVAILABLE AT KNOX COUNTY HEALTH DEPARTMENT LOCATIONS Teague Clinic (405 Dante Road) West Clinic (1028 Old Cedar Bluff) KCHD Main (140 Dameron Ave) The vaccines and boosters being administered varies by availability and demand. Call 865-215-5555 to schedule an appointment. Para español, llame al 865-215-5564. MORE KNOX COUNTY VACCINE & BOOSTER INFORMATION Please visit [covid.knoxcountytn.gov/vaccine-info.html](https://covid.knoxcountytn.gov/vaccine-info.html) for more information about vaccine and booster shots in Knox County. [Click here](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html) for CDC guidelines on booster shots. VACCINE FINDER If no appointments are available through Knox County's registration, visit [VaccineFinder.org](https://vaccinefinder.org/) for other opportunities. Vaccine Finder is a free, online service where users can search for locations that offer vaccinations. VACCINE 101 The State's Vaccine 101 helps to educate Tennesseans about important information related to COVID-19 vaccines, and connects them to vital resources. Learn more at [covid19.tn.gov/covid-19-vaccines](https://covid19.tn.gov/covid-19-vaccines/) . VACCINE DATA Knox County COVID-19 Vaccination Reporting from the TN Health Department UPDATED December 31, 2022 Data below are updated daily on the [Tennessee Department of Health's website ](https://www.tn.gov/health/cedep/ncov/data/downloadable-datasets.html) |Vaccine Count ||New |818427 ||131 ||307712 ||10 |TN Department of Health COVID-19 Vaccination Reporting Each day the State provides a data sheet showing total vaccinations reported, vaccinations reported for just that day, and vaccinations by age group, race, ethnicity, sex and additional data for the State. The report also shows the status of first dose, second dose and county numbers. [View the daily Tennessee
